alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:38PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Limestone and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 838 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Ardmore, or 10 miles north of Athens, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athens, Fayetteville, Ardmore, Elkmont, Dellrose, Cash Point, Skinem, Holland Gin, Leggtown and Mcburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
